name: Gifting Simulator
description:
Perfect the surprise of gifting and gain confidence with this gifting simulator.

Features:

  • Infinite target recipients, uniquely represented with accurate emotional responses
  • Over 4 gifts

Made in 48 hours for Yogscast Game Jam 2020.

'Is That You or Are You You?' by Chris Zabriskie is licenced under CC BY 3.0.
